common_1150_system_01: Open the gate to the Zero Lab?
common_1150_system_02: You decided to press the button and open—
common_1150_rival_01:
Huh? Why? We’re finally on the cusp of getting
into the lab![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1150_friend_02:
Look—if it’s true that a bunch of really dangerous
Pokémon might come at us, then shouldn’t we\r
also have [VAR PKNAME(0001)] help?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1150_rival_02:
Yeah, if [VAR PKNAME(0001)] were like how we first saw it
in the Inlet Grotto, that’d be a huge help!\c
I wanna see it battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1150_botan_01:
Uhhh... But it hasn’t even wanted to let us ride it
ever since we came down to Area Zero.\c
And it can’t enter its battle form in the first place![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1150_friend_03:
But it’s really strong. I know it is.\c
It ate all those Herba Mystica we found, too!
When it really matters, I’m sure it’ll fight![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1150_friend_04:
And Area Zero is where it used to live...\c
If you bring it out of its ball now, maybe it’ll be
able to find its family, too. Right?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1150_rival_03: That’s pretty sensible by your standards, Arven![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1150_rival_04:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Go on, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Let
[VAR PKNAME(0001)] out![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1150_rival_05:
C’mon, it’ll be fine! Even if [VAR PKNAME(0001)] can’t fight,
I’ll protect it! OK?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1150_friend_05:
All right! Come on, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!\c
Now that we’ve got [VAR PKNAME(0001)] ready, it’s time to
open that gate![VAR 0114(0006)]
